text:
The output from JSP can contain rediculous amounts of whitespace (eg when 
tables get generated via JSTL iterators).  We need some kind of JSP pre-
processor to pre-compress the JSP source, removing all the nice whitespace that 
we generally leave in to aid legibility etc etc.

FYI: This problem caused a JSP generate web-page (Websphere 5.0) to be 3.5MB in 
size, zapping whitespace reduced this to 1.2M !

I have a task that I use to perform this and would like to submit it.

Created attachment 8721
This Task implements the requested feature of removing whitespace from pre-compiled JSP source
